top_comment.text:
Can anyone explain the reference to Jedong and Cheonggye Mountain? Is it 
associated with a folk talk perhaps? I've searched but I can't find 
anything.﻿
top_comment.author: Kevin Carter

comments.text:
+perhaps in love Thank you very much for answering my question and 
explaining it so well.
comments.author: Kevin Carter

comments.text:
Kim Jedong (Jedong Oppa in this song), being single et the famousTV 
broadcaster in Korea, like climbing  Cheonggye Mountain near Seoul. In 
South Korea. many people like the mountain climbing, especially young men 
and women love to climb a mountain like Cheonggye Mountain for dating the 
opposite sex. But, like the lyrics of this song, and after coming down from 
the mountain, beautiful women usually do not contact the men whom these 
women do not like, unlike in the mountains. Kim Jedong's appearance seems 
to do not seduce women. So, it seems that he remains yet single.
comments.author: perhaps in love

0:20 코타 Kota(Main vocal,rapper)
0:39 승아 Seung-Ah(Vocal)
1:12 주비 Jubi(Main vocal)
1:36 미성 Misung(Rapper)

producer.But now he left the group.However he become a Sunnyhill's Producer 
and composer.
